Toothbrush:    - As a gentle scrubber, use it to clean delicate surfaces like glass or plastic without scratching them.
Tea Bag:    - Instead of just steeping tea, use the soaked tea bag as a natural fabric softener when rinsing clothes in your washing machine.
Coffee Filter:    - Use a coffee filter to create a temporary dust collector for your home by hanging it over a jar or vase, allowing you to easily shake off accumulated dust.
Plastic Wrap:    - Make a simple, no-sew pillowcase by cutting a rectangle of plastic wrap large enough to cover your pillow, securing it in place with rubber bands or clips.
Paper Clip:    - Secure a paper clip to a corner of your desk or wall to hold up a small, lightweight poster or note without damaging the surface.
